body_html:
You can pass a function to tf.device, and use the function to guide where each op is placed. see that test_divice_function_ping_variable_to_cpu in above example always assign all variable ops to cpu.

with tf.device(your_placement_policy_function):
bulid your whole network

body:
You can pass a function to tf.device, and use the function to guide where each op is placed. see that `test_divice_function_ping_variable_to_cpu` in above example always assign all variable ops to cpu. 

with tf.device(your_placement_policy_function): 
 bulid your whole network
